sub_title: Helping customers shape their Success with IFS
summary:
Highly driven business developer & commercial manager with strong international network in various industries. Successful track record in enterprise software and consultancy sales for 10+ years. Passion for guiding clients in their search for value & improvement through digital solutions. 

Keywords: professional / positive mindset / challenger / critical / team player / persistent 

Proud to represent IFS, a fast growing & innovative enterprise software company providing solutions for companies that are project or service centered or heavily rely on assets in their core business. With our industry focus and value centered approach we help our customers be their best in their moment of service. 

If you'd like to know more about how we can support driving value in your organization, don't hesitate to reach out!

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
IFS is a global enterprise software company providing solutions along ERP, Asset Management and (Field) Service Management. 

IFS Success is a unique, composable, outcome-based services framework that will help our clients secure the highest possible value of their IFS investment in an everchanging business environment. 

In my position, I support most crucial Success opportunities in the North & Central Europe region to ensure they are closed, compliant and with the highest possible value for our customers. To do so, I help shape the commercial strategy and offering and subsequently support the commercial and legal negotiation processes.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Success Regional Sales Lead

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all sales in the vertical of Construction & Engineering in the Benelux region. 
•	Owning the end-to-end sales process including demand generation, opportunity qualification, building and managing the (pre)sales team of up to 10 people, owning the RFI/RFP process, building the deal strategy and utilising resources within a matrix organization to put us in a position to win. 
•	Liaising with prospect relations from the business, IT and executive management to build relations, present IFS solutions, manage and influence opportunities and negotiate commercial & legal terms.
•	Using advanced sales methods such as business value engineering, creating & sharing customer specific video content. 
•	Internal senior stakeholder management, reporting to market unit & regional management and engaging them in opportunities where necessary. 
•	Build and manage a partner network for demand generation and engagement in opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Anywhere365 is a SaaS solution for omnichannel Contact Center functionality, natively integrating to MS Teams and the wider Microsoft stack. My job was to lead the company’s commercial growth in the Asia Pacific region, with a focus on Australia. 

•	Setting up partnerships & sales channels with a variety of partners like Microsoft, telephony companies and managed services providers. Making partners enthusiastic by online presentations & system demo’s, negotiating terms and closing reseller contracts. 
•	Operational sales to a wide variety of prospect accounts in numerous industries from initiation & discovery to presentation, system demo’s, negotiations & contacting. 
•	Organizing marketing efforts i.e. webinars, white papers. 

In under a year I was able to set up an active pipeline with 40+ qualified opportunities and close various deals. I left the company to pursue opportunities closer to my long term ambition and better fitting my personal life, but was expected to come out on/above target for FY21.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager APAC
VP Business
Account Development Manager
Managing Consultant - Rotterdam office

profile_positions.description:
Started as a Junior Consultant in the Breda office and worked my way up to a Senior Consultant in our newly opened office in Rotterdam. In this position I constantly maintained and grew my network, both with candidates as well as with clients in the region. I mainly focused on shipbuilding, offshore and machining industries. 

My core responsibilities were: 
- Acquiring new business
- Recruiting suitable candidates for a wide variety of technical jobs
- Acting as liaison between client and candidate
- Visiting clients and projects for evaluation
- Contracting

Accomplishments:
•	Nationwide best performing Commercial Consultant in 2013 (out of 40+ consultants) 
•	Building various major client relations from acquisition to a key accounts for the company
profile_positions.title: (Senior) Consultant

profile_positions.description: Implementing marketing campaigns, organizing events for small to midsized parties (8-200 people) and responsible for both internal and external communications. In addition to these daily activities, executing graduation research into the success of the longest running Holland Casino event (Special Ladies Day) and the role of the use of entertainment and communication on that evening. The recommendations from this study have been adopted nationally in the approach of the event.
profile_positions.title: Graduating intern Sales & Marketing

profile_positions.description: Part-time work next to fulltime education. Started in 2004 as a Surveyor, progressed to Lead Surveyor and eventually worked as an independent Junior Researcher for almost a year. Conducted both quantitative and qualitative research for, among others, the municipality of The Hague, the ING Group and V&D and wrote major segments of research reports independently.
profile_positions.title: (Lead) Surveyor / Junior Researcher
